summary: The problematic lives of teenager students for whom the singer Lily Chou-Chou's dreamy music is the only way to escape an alienating, violent and insensitive society.
cast: Hayato Ichihara|Shûgo Oshinari|Ayumi Itô|Takao Osawa|Miwako Ichikawa|Izumi Inamori|Yû Aoi|Kazusa Matsuda|Ryô Katsuji|Chiyo Abe|Takako Baba|Anri Ban|Kaori Fujii|Shinji Higuchi|Takahito Hosoyamada|Hayato Isohata|Yuki Ito|Tomohiro Kaku|Hideyuki Kasahara|Mana Kodama|Masumi Okamura|Tetsu Sawaki|Tetta Sugimoto|Issey Takahashi|Yoji Tanaka|Kenta Uchino|Mayuko Yoshioka
title: Todo sobre Lily
